body_html:
We might be saying the same thing, but I'm going to restate it to be clear: I think subclassing mp.Process should be fine. The problem with the original example was that it inherited resources, which doesn't work with "spawn" and you need to use "spawn" to do CUDA multiprocessing.

Here's an example that works with CUDA multiprocessing and subclasses Process:
https://gist.github.com/colesbury/606e3838d56ca33996cc40ef00bcdb6b
